title: Launcher stuck at 0% and calculating differences
body: Im so damn confused. To my knowledge, there is no patch or anything to be downloaded, and if there is, why is it stuck at 0%? Please Help

replies.body: Your patcher is attempting to scan files but is being blocked from doing so.  I suggest going over our [permissions ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)guide to have your OS restore access to the patcher and game files.  Let me know if you still have any issues!
